data.message:
Hope Facebook can get back to me.
I really have a problem with my facebook pages.
Please!

replies.message: Hello Harvey. What type of issues are you experiencing with your Facebook pages? -Sarah
Facebook, I just sent you a private message. Kindly check. Thanks and I'm hoping for your response.

Facebook,

Please review my page merge request. I have 2 pages with the same name and contents. Thanks and I'm hoping for your positive response.

1. https://www.facebook.com/CountryThang 
2. https://www.facebook.com/itsCountryThang

I want to keep https://www.facebook.com/CountryThang.
Thank you so much.

Hi Harvey. If you've already submit a request, rest assured that our team will address it as soon as possible. In the meantime, you can track the status of your request in your Support Dashboard. Learn more at: http://on.fb.me/1s4Kpg1 -Ryan
Facebook, I have already tried merging my 2 pages many times but always being denied. My 2 pages have the same name and contents. Please help me.
